name: Red Rover (itch) (Splickety)
description:
When your rover crash lands on the wrong planet, explore a mysterious world with limited data. Can you figure out what planet you're on?

CONTROLS:

CLICK to move.

RIGHT CLICK to use your special ability.

Z, X, C to toggle abilities.

Red Rover was created as a project for Beginner's Jam #3. The theme was "A Different Planet." Life hit, and I wasn't able to finish in time, but I'm very proud of what I came up with. This is my first game I've ever coded from beginning to end. I hope you enjoy.
